title: The Wizard of Oz
review: The Wizard of Oz will, beyond question, be accorded recognition as a milestone in motion picture history.

title: Inception
review: A spectacular fantasy thriller based on Nolan's own original screenplay, Inception is the smartest CGI head-trip since The Matrix.

title: Hereditary
review: The open-ended stakes of these genre experiments are rebellious at a time when horror movie messaging can feel so heavy-handed.
